      • start

        protected final void start()
        Starts the main game loop. Should be called after createDisplay()

      • createDisplay

        protected void createDisplay(java.lang.String name,
                 int width,
                 int height)
        Creates the java window and sets up for display. should be called before start()
        Parameters:
        name - The title of the window.
        width - The width of the window.
        height - The height of the window.

      • run

        public void run()
        DO NOT CALL! used for threading only!
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable

      • show

        call at end of render. prints buffer to screen.

        call from main method to start the game.
